commits.message: Remove header titles from Navigation component for a cleaner layout; retain ThemeToggle for improved user experience.

commits.message: Refactor Cloudflare API integration by removing logging statements in route handler for cleaner output; implement generic pagination helper in cloudflare-api.ts for improved data retrieval across API endpoints.

commits.message: Refactor DNS and SSL page components by removing unused Layout imports and standardizing useEffect hooks for loading accounts, improving code clarity and consistency.

commits.message: Update Next.js configuration to ignore TypeScript build errors; refactor layout structure by integrating Navigation component and removing unused Layout component, streamlining page components for improved clarity.

commits.message: Refactor layout.tsx for improved readability by standardizing formatting and indentation in the RootLayout component.

commits.message: Remove unused old theme code

commits.message: Fix typo in no records message for DNS and SSL certificates pages; add eslint directive to suppress exhaustive-deps warning in useEffect hooks.
commits.author: Kakapo Nick

commits.message: Refactor project structure to migrate from Vite to Next.js; update dependencies and scripts in package.json, remove unused files, and enhance .gitignore for better environment management.
commits.author: Kakapo Nick

commits.message: Enhance BulkEditARecordDialog with improved layout and styling; integrate ScrollArea for better display of selected domains and update component structure for improved usability.
commits.author: Kakapo Nick

commits.message: Update button styles for improved usability; replace Edit icon with Edit2 in bulk edit dialog; adjust button height in DNS cell; add copy domain functionality in domain row with toast notifications.

commits.message: Enhance DomainsPage with improved sorting, filtering, and loading states; update AddDomainDialog to include a title prop and refine DNS cell display for better usability.

commits.author: Kakapo Nick

commits.message: Refactor DNS cell components to replace Spinner with Skeleton for loading states, enhancing user experience during data fetching.

commits.message: Remove DomainsPage component and its associated logic from the codebase, streamlining the application structure.
